Export.CSP: $(document).ready(function() { $dialog=$(".dialog"); $.fn.getContent=function(obj) { var grpID=obj.getAttribute("grpID"); var lnkID=obj.getAttribute("lnkID"); if(typeof grpID == "undefined") grpID=""; if(typeof lnkID == "undefined") lnkID=""; $.get("/inc/inc_dialogcontent.asp?grpID=" + grpID + "&lnkID=" + lnkID, function(data) {$(obj).html(data)}); } $dialog.dialog({ title: "Modifikácia skupín a odkazov", autoOpen: false, height: 300, width: 550, modal: true, lnkID: null, ono: "pažec Hore", open: function(){ $('.ui-state-default').css('float','right'); $(this).getContent(this); }, overlay: { backgroundColor: '#000', opacity: 0.5 }, buttons: { "Zavri": function() { //alert($(this).dialog('option','ono')); //$(this).dialog("makeSo",txt); $(this).dialog("close"); }, "Uloi": function() { var lnkID=this.getAttribute("lnkID"); var grpID=$("#cmbGroup").val(); var mUrl=$("#murl").val().replace(/&/g,"~"); //.replace(/?/g,"°"); $.get("/inc/inc_save.asp?lnkID="+ lnkID +"&grpID=" + grpID + "&grpName=" + $("#cmbGroup option:selected").text() + "&lnkName=" + $("#nazov").val() + "&lnkUrl=" + mUrl, function(msg){ if(msg.toString() != "1") { alert(msg.replace(/~/g,"\n\n")); } else { location.reload() }}); return }}}); //extend fn $.extend($.ui.dialog.prototype, { makeSo:function(parm) { alert(parm);} }); $(".newRecord").bind({'click': function() { $dialog.attr({'lnkID':'','grpID':''}); $dialog.dialog('option','title','Nový záznam'); $dialog.dialog('open'); }}); $(".grpName").each(function(){ $(this).css({textDecoration:"underline",cursor:"pointer"}) $(this).bind("click",function() { grpID="grp" + $(this).next().next().val().toString(); $("." + grpID).toggle(); }) }); $(".pushPin").each(function(){ $(this).bind("click",function() { grpID=$(this).prev().val().toString(); action = $(this).hasClass("pinned") ? 0 : 1; $.ajax({ cache: false, type: "POST",url: "/inc/inc_pin_unpin.asp", data: "skupinaID=" + grpID + "&pin=" + action, success: function(msg) { location.reload(); } }); }); }); }) function editDialog(grpID,lnkID) { $dialog.attr({'lnkID':lnkID,'grpID':grpID}); $dialog.dialog('option','title','Zmena odkazu id:' + lnkID); $dialog.dialog('open'); return; }
